name: Dawex Systems
membership:
Cap Digital http://www.capdigital.com
Big Data Value Association http://www.bdva.eu
goal: Dawex, a leading data exchange technology company and the operator of the largest data marketplace, allows organizations to orchestrate data circulation by sourcing, monetizing and exchanging data directly, securely and in full compliance with regulations. Today 8,000 organizations from 20+ sectors rely on Dawex Global Data Marketplace and Data Exchange Platform solutions to build their data exchange strategy.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Digital Single Market
Building a European Data Economy
Free Flow of non-personal data
General Data Protection Regulation
Horizon 2020
